mouse_platform.name: Mouse Platform
mouse_platform.notes: Radius is the distance from the center of the wheel to the mouse.

position.device_origin: Located at the center of the screen. Right and left conventions are relative to the screen side of the monitor, ie. from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: X
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center towards the right of the screen, from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: Y
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center towards the top of the screen.

device_axes.name: Z
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the front of the screen towards the subject.

position.notes: The rotation matrix is represented as: a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i. Wherein a, b, c correspond to the first row of the matrix. The translation matrix is represented as: x,y,z.

position.device_origin: Located on the face of the lens mounting surface at its center, ie. just ahead of the camera sensor.

device_axes.name: X
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the left of the assembly, from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: Y
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the bottom of the assembly.

device_axes.name: Z
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the sensor towards the subject.

position.notes: The rotation matrix is represented as: a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i. Wherein a, b, c correspond to the first row of the matrix. The translation matrix is represented as: x,y,z.

device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the bottom of the assembly.

device_axes.name: Z
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the sensor towards the subject.

session.session_type: A study on the effect of psilocybin on neocortical L5 pyramidal neurons using NP UHD (Switchable) probes

stimulus_epochs.notes: Saline injection occurred ~5 min after this script finished running.
anesthesia (1.5% isoflurane) began ~1 minute after this stimulus epoch ended
anesthesia (1.5% isoflurane) ended ~1 minute after this stimulus epoch ended.
